description: WebhookConfig configures notifications via a generic receiver supporting the webhook payload. See https://prometheus.io/docs/alerting/latest/configuration/#webhook_config

max_alerts.description: Maximum number of alerts to be sent per webhook message. When 0, all alerts are included.

send_resolved.description: SendResolved controls notify about resolved alerts.

timeout.description: Timeout is the maximum time allowed to invoke the webhook available since v0.28.0 alertmanager version

url.description: URL to send requests to, one of `urlSecret` and `url` must be defined.

url_secret.description: URLSecret defines secret name and key at the CRD namespace. It must contain the webhook URL. one of `urlSecret` and `url` must be defined.
